source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_nsip_service_user_dim is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_service_user_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPServiceUserID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS NSIPServiceUserID,
    Concat('P_',id)                 AS ContactID,
    T1.id                           AS odtID,
    T1.salutation                   AS Salutation,
    T1.firstname                    AS FirstName,
    T1.lastname                     AS LastName,
    T1.addressline1                 AS AddressLine1,
    T1.addressline2                 AS AddressLine2,
    T1.addressltown                  AS AddressTown,
    T1.addresscounty                AS AddressCounty,
    T1.postcode                     AS PostCode,
    T1.addresscountry               AS AddressCountry,
    T1.organisation                 AS Organisation,
    T1.organisationtype             AS OrganisationType,
    T1.role                         AS Role,
    T1.telephoneNumber              AS TelephoneNumber,
    T1.otherphonenumber             AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T1.faxnumber                    AS FaxNumber,
    T1.emailaddress                 AS EmailAddress,
    T1.webaddress                   AS WebAddress,
    T1.serviceusertype              AS ServiceUserType,
    T1.caseReference                AS CaseReference,
    T1.sourceSuid                   AS SourceSuID,
    "0"                             AS Migrated,
    T1.sourceSystem                 AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.salutation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.firstName,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lastName,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressLine1,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressLine2,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressTown,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressCounty,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.postCode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressCountry,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.organisation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.organisationType,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.role,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.telephoneNumber,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.otherPhoneNumber,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.faxNumber,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.emailAddress,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.webAddress,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.serviceUserType,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseReference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sourceSuid,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.service_user T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim T4 
    ON T1.projectemailaddress = T4.EmailAddress AND 
        T4.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim T3 
    ON T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.odtID,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.salutation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.firstName,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lastName,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressLine1,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressLine2,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressTown,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressCounty,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.postCode,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressCountry,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.organisation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.organisationType,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.role,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.telephoneNumber,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.otherPhoneNumber,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.faxNumber,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.emailAddress,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.webAddress,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.serviceUserType,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseReference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sourceSuid,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.casereference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.service_user)
    AND LEFT(T1.casereference,3) IN ("TR0","WW0","BC0","WA0","WS0","EN0")
;

SELECT DISTINCT(count(*)) FROM odw_standardised_db.service_user;
SELECT count(*) FROM casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new;
SELECT * FROM casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    NSIPServiceUserID,
    ContactID,
    odtID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    WebAddress,
    ServiceUserType,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSuID,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    

From casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    NSIPServiceUserID,
    ContactID,
    odtID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    WebAddress,
    ServiceUserType,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSuID,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new WHERE NSIPServiceUserID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_nsip_service_user_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    NSIPServiceUserID,
    ContactID,
    odtID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    WebAddress,
    ServiceUserType,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSuID,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim AS Target
USING casework_nsip_service_user_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.NSIPServiceUserID = Target.NSIPServiceUserID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        NSIPServiceUserID,
        ContactID,
        odtID,
        Salutation,
        FirstName,
        LastName,
        AddressLine1,
        AddressLine2,
        AddressTown,
        AddressCounty,
        PostCode,
        AddressCountry,
        Organisation,
        OrganisationType,
        Role,
        TelephoneNumber,
        OtherPhoneNumber,
        FaxNumber,
        EmailAddress,
        WebAddress,
        ServiceUserType,
        CaseReference,
        SourceSuID,
        Migrated,
        ODTSourceSystem,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.NSIPServiceUserID,
        Source.ContactID,
        Source.odtID,
        Source.Salutation,
        Source.FirstName,
        Source.LastName,
        Source.AddressLine1,
        Source.AddressLine2,
        Source.AddressTown,
        Source.AddressCounty,
        Source.PostCode,
        Source.AddressCountry,
        Source.Organisation,
        Source.OrganisationType,
        Source.Role,
        Source.TelephoneNumber,
        Source.OtherPhoneNumber,
        Source.FaxNumber,
        Source.EmailAddress,
        Source.WebAddress,
        Source.ServiceUserType,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.SourceSuID,
        Source.Migrated,
        Source.ODTSourceSystem,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_nsip_service_user_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NSIPServiceUserID NULLS LAST) AS NSIPServiceUserID,
    ContactID,
    odtID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    WebAddress,
    ServiceUserType,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSuID,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_service_user_dim;
